Used for [[processing|Vacuum Oil Processing]] either [[crude oil|Crude Oil]] or [[desulfurized crude oil|Desulfurized Crude Oil]]. Processing of oil requires it to be pressured to 2 PU using [[compressors|Compressor]]. Unlike the [[refinery|Oil Refinery]], oil does not need to be heated. Has four fluid outputs.

The inclusion of [[bismuth|Bismuth]] in its recipe requires the [[RBMK]] to be built first.
